name: Dhamma Pubbananda (Vipassana Meditation)
category: Buddhist-owned Meeting space rentals in Delaware
description: This is the first urban Vipassana meditation center in North America, owned and operated by the Mid-Atlantic Vipassana Association. It is situated on 13 acres and has undergone renovations. They offer meditation courses and opportunities for service

name: Insight Meditation Community of Lewes (IMC-Lewes)
address: St. Peter's Community (formerly known as Parish) Hall, 200 block of Mulberry Street, Lewes, DE (for hybrid meetings)
category: Buddhist-owned Meeting space rentals in Delaware
description: IMC-Lewes offers meditation sits, Dharma study groups, and retreats, with many events held via Zoom. They also offer a hybrid option for some in-person meetings at St. Peter's Community Hall. They welcome people of all backgrounds
